name: Dirty Fork: Unleash the Mayhem
description:

Why Just Leave a Bad Zelp Review?

Ludum Dare 32 Compo Entry - #108 in Humor Category (Jam Theme: An Unconventional Weapon)

This might just be the first "Karen Simulation" to have ever been released (in 2015).

Horrors! You have been given a dirty fork! There is only one appropriate way to respond to this insult: Food Fight! Try to chase all of the customers away before the restaurant staff stops you.

Pick up food from various place settings around the restaurant, and throw it at unsuspecting customers. If you connect, the customer will leave in disgust, and you will increasingly annoy the restaurant staff. First the maitre 'd will try to put you in your place. Soon, waiters, chefs, and managers will come out of the kitchen to throw food back at you.

Can you drive away all of the customers before the staff puts an end to your rampage?

Tips

Break glass for bonus points.

Waiters cannot throw food at you unless they pick it up from the table. Chefs and managers have their own supply of food.

The manager throws food twice as often as the chef.

The maitre'd is hoity-toity and thus is above throwing food, favoring a hard slap.

This game was created for Ludum Dare 32. All assets in it, aside from the logo and some allowed base code, were created within the 48 hour competition window. Unfortunately, the Internet Wayback machine did not preserve my Ludum Dare project page for this event.
